mn113:3.5.pli: So tāya uccākulīnatāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:3.5.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:3.11.pli: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya uccākulīnatāya nevattānukkaṁseti na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:3.11.en: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their eminent family.

mn113:4-6.6.pli: So tāya uḷārabhogatāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:4-6.6.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:4-6.12.pli: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya uḷārabhogatāya nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:4-6.12.en: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their extremely wealthy family.

mn113:7.4.pli: So tena ñattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:7.4.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:7.10.pli: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena ñattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:7.10.en: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their fame.

mn113:8.4.pli: So tena lābhena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:8.4.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:8.10.pli: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena lābhena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:8.10.en: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their material possessions.

mn113:16-20.8.pli: So tena ekāsanikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:16-20.8.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:16-20.14.pli: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena ekāsanikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:16-20.14.en: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their eating in one sitting per day.

mn113:21.4.pli: So tāya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:21.4.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:21.9.pli: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:21.9.en: Keeping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the first absorption.

mn113:22-24.6.pli: So tāya catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:22-24.6.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:22-24.11.pli: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:22-24.11.en: Keeping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the fourth absorption.

mn113:28.4.pli: So tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:28.4.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn113:28.9.pli: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:28.9.en: Keeping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.

mn29:2.6.pli: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:2.6.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down because of that:

mn29:3.6.pli: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:3.6.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn29:3.10.pli: So tāya sīlasampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:3.10.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that:

mn29:4.27.pli: So tāya samādhisampadāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:4.27.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that:

mn29:5.16.pli: So tena ñāṇadassanena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn29:5.16.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that,

mn29:6.6.pli: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.6.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn29:6.9.pli: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.9.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn29:6.12.pli: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.12.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn29:6.15.pli: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn29:6.15.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 29
The Longer Simile of the Heartwood

mn60:8.6.pli: Tāya ca pana asaddhammasaññattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn60:8.6.en: And on account of that they glorify themselves and put others down.

mn60:11.6.pli: Tāya ca pana saddhammasaññattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn60:11.6.en: And on account of that they don’t glorify themselves or put others down.

mn60:16.6.pli: Tāya ca pana asaddhammasaññattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn60:16.6.en: And on account of that they glorify themselves and put others down.

mn60:19.6.pli: Tāya ca pana saddhammasaññattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn60:19.6.en: And on account of that they don’t glorify themselves or put others down.

mn60:24.6.pli: Tāya ca pana asaddhammasaññattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn60:24.6.en: And on account of that they glorify themselves and put others down.

mn60:27.6.pli: Tāya ca pana saddhammasaññattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn60:27.6.en: And on account of that they don’t glorify themselves or put others down.

mn30:8.6.pli: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti:
mn30:8.6.en: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that:

mn30:12.6.pli: So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn30:12.6.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn30:12.10.pli: So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn30:12.10.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn30:12.14.pli: So tāya samādhisampadāya na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn30:12.14.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mn30:12.18.pli: So tena ñāṇadassanena na attānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn30:12.18.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 30
The Shorter Simile of the Heartwood

dn25:9.5.pli: Puna caparaṁ, nigrodha, tapassī tapaṁ samādiyati, so tena tapasā attānukkaṁseti paraṁ vambheti.
dn25:9.5.en: Furthermore, a mortifier undertakes a practice of mortification. They glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

dn25:10.4.pli: Puna caparaṁ, nigrodha, tapassī tapaṁ samādiyati, so tena tapasā lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti, so tena lābhasakkārasilokena attānukkaṁseti paraṁ vambheti.
dn25:10.4.en: Furthermore, a mortifier undertakes a practice of mortification. They generate possessions, honor, and popularity through that mortification. They glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.

dn25:13.10.pli: Puna caparaṁ, nigrodha, tapassī tapaṁ samādiyati, so tena tapasā lābhasakkārasilokaṁ abhinibbatteti, so tena lābhasakkārasilokena na attānukkaṁseti na paraṁ vambheti …pe…
dn25:13.10.en: They don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of possessions, honor, and popularity …

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 25
The Lion’s Roar at Udumbarikā’s Monastery
1. On the Wanderer Nigrodha

an10.78:1.8.en: They glorify themselves and put others down.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 10
8. If You Want
78. Jains

mn4:13.2.pli: ‘ye kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā attukkaṁsakā paravambhī araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevanti, attukkaṁsanaparavambhanasandosahetu have te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā akusalaṁ bhayabheravaṁ avhāyanti.
mn4:13.2.en: ‘There are ascetics and brahmins who glorify themselves and put others down …

mn76:53.5.pli: Ime panājīvakā puttamatāya puttā attānañceva ukkaṁsenti, pare ca vambhenti tayo ceva niyyātāro paññapenti, seyyathidaṁ—
mn76:53.5.en: But these Ājīvaka ascetics, those sons of dead sons, glorify themselves and put others down. And they only recognize three emancipators:
